original_text:
The king of Babylon has heard reports about them,
    and his hands hang limp.
Anguish has gripped him,
    pain like that of a woman in labor.
korean_text: 바벨론의 왕이 그 소문을 듣고 손이 약하여지며 고통에 사로잡혀 해산하는 여인처럼 진통하는도다

sentences.original_text: The king of Babylon has heard reports about them
sentences.korean_translation: 바빌론 왕이 그들에 대한 소문을 들었다

sentences.original_text: pain like that of a woman in labor
